text: James Rudolph Garfield (October 17, 1865 â€“ March 24, 1950) was an American lawyer and politician. Garfield was a son of President James A. Garfield and First Lady Lucretia Garfield. He was the Secretary of the Interior when Theodore Roosevelt was president. ==References== Category:1865 births Category:1950 deaths Category:Lawyers from Cleveland Category:Politicians from Cleveland
title: James Rudolph Garfield
